item.title: 报告显示，2025 年上半年全球保险巨灾损失达 800 亿美元
item.description: 瑞士再保险研究所周三的初步估计显示，受加利福尼亚州野火和美国严重雷暴的影响，2025 年上半年全球自然灾害保险损失达到 800 亿美元。【原文：Global insured losses from natural catastrophes reached $80 billion in the first half of 2025, preliminary estimates from Swiss Re Institute showed on Wednesday, driven by wildfires in California and severe thunderstorms in the United States.】

item.title: 日本执政党重量级人物警告反对日本央行加息
item.description: 执政党重量级人物齐藤健（Ken Saito）告诉路透社，鉴于美国关税对脆弱经济的预期打击，日本央行必须谨慎对待加息问题。【原文：The Bank of Japan must be cautious about raising interest rates given the expected hit from U.S. tariffs on the fragile economy, ruling party heavyweight Ken Saito told Reuters.】

item.title: 马斯克称 xAI 将开源 Grok 2 聊天机器人
item.description: 亿万富翁埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）周三表示，他的人工智能初创公司xAI将于下周开源其聊天机器人Grok 2。【原文：Billionaire Elon Musk said on Wednesday that his artificial intelligence startup xAI will open source its chatbot Grok 2 next week.】

item.title: Blackstone 将以 34 亿美元将日本 TechnoPro 私有化
item.description: 日本工程师招聘公司 TechnoPro Holdings 周三表示，以美国投资基金 Blackstone 为首的集团将以每股 4,870 日元的价格向 TechnoPro Holdings 发起 5,074 亿日元（约合 34.4 亿美元）的要约收购。【原文：U.S. investment fund Blackstone-led group will launch a 507.4 billion yen ($3.44 billion) tender offer for TechnoPro Holdings at 4,870 yen per share, the Japanese engineer staffing firm said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 本田第一季度营业利润下降 50
item.description: 本田汽车公司周四报告称，由于日元走强和美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的关税影响，该公司第一季度营业利润下降了50%。【原文：Honda Motor reported a 50% drop in first-quarter operating profit on Thursday, as a stronger yen and the impact of U.S. President Donald Trump's tariffs took a toll on its results.】

item.title: 德国 6 月工业订单下降 1
item.description: 德国联邦统计局周三表示，德国 6 月份的工业订单有所下降，经季节和日历调整后比上月减少了 1%。【原文：German industrial orders fell in June, declining by 1% on the previous month on a seasonally and calendar adjusted basis, the federal statistics office said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 日本称美国在贸易协定下的投资将取决于东京的利益
item.description: 日本的最高关税谈判代表周二表示，日本在上个月达成的贸易协议中承诺的 5500 亿美元的美国投资将取决于这些投资是否也能使东京受益。【原文：Japan's promised $550 billion in U.S. investments under the trade deal struck last month will be determined by whether they will benefit Tokyo too, the Asian nation's top tariff negotiator said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 拜耳称在重组推进过程中迄今已裁员 12,000 人
item.description: 拜耳公司周三表示，自重组计划启动以来，该公司已削减了约 12000 个全职职位，以加快决策速度并减少管理和行政职位。【原文：Bayer said on Wednesday it had cut about 12,000 full-time positions since the start of a restructuring programme to speed up decision-making and reduce managerial and administrative positions.】

item.title: 受美国关税影响，印尼计划改向中国出售虾类
item.description: 在距离华盛顿特区 16,000 多公里（9,942 英里）的印度尼西亚的一个养虾场，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的进口关税使 Denny Leonardo 的扩张计划陷入困境。【原文：At a shrimp farm in Indonesia, more than 16,000 km (9,942 miles) from Washington D.C., U.S. President Donald Trump's import tariffs have left Denny Leonardo's expansion plans in disarray.】

item.title: 伟哥制造商诺和诺德第二季度销售额增长 18
item.description: Wegovy 制造商诺和诺德公司周三公布的第二季度销售额增长了 18%，低于分析师最初的预期，而上周发布的重大盈利预警和新任首席执行官的宣布使该公司股价损失了约 950 亿美元。【原文：Wegovy-maker Novo Nordisk reported second-quarter sales up 18% on Wednesday, below initial analyst expectations, after a major profit warning and new CEO announcement last week wiped some $95 billion of value from the company's stock.】

item.title: 美国需求强劲，西门子能源将 2025 年展望目标定为上限
item.description: 西门子能源公司（Siemens Energy）周三表示，受风力涡轮机部门和美国对其电力设备强劲需求的推动，该公司有望实现其2025年业绩展望的上限，这有助于该公司摆脱进口关税的影响。【原文：Siemens Energy expects to hit the upper end of its 2025 outlook, it said on Wednesday, driven by its wind turbine division and strong demand in the United States for its power equipment that helped it to shrug off the impact of import tariffs.】

item.title: 诺和诺德减肥挑战五张图表
item.description: 丹麦制药商诺和诺德（Novo Nordisk）的减肥药伟哥维（Wegovy）正面临重大挑战。【原文：Danish drugmaker Novo Nordisk is facing a major challenge to its blockbuster weight-loss drug Wegovy.】

item.title: 早间竞价关税税费尚未吓退股市多头
item.description: Stella Qiu 对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Stella Qiu】

item.title: 国泰航空半年盈利因客运量增加及燃油成本降低而上升
item.description: 国泰航空公司（Cathay Pacific Airways）周三公布，上半年利润增长了1%，原因是客运量增加、燃油价格下降以及货运表现稳定。【原文：Cathay Pacific Airways on Wednesday reported a 1% increase in first-half profit, citing higher passenger volumes, lower fuel prices and steady cargo performance.】

item.title: 独家报道信号缺失，交易失利：印美贸易谈判是如何破裂的？
item.description: 经过五轮贸易谈判后，印度官员对与美国达成有利协议充满信心，他们甚至向媒体表示，关税上限可能为 15%。【原文：After five rounds of trade negotiations, Indian officials were so confident of securing a favourable deal with the United States that they even signalled to the media that tariffs could be capped at 15%.】

item.title: 马斯克与莫迪：印度互联网审查制度之争的内幕
item.description: 今年 1 月，埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的社交媒体平台 X 上的一条旧帖子引起了印度萨塔拉市警方的关注。这条短消息写于 2023 年，来自一个只有几百名追随者的账户，其中描述了一位执政党高级政治家 "一无是处"。【原文：In January, an old post on Elon Musk's social media platform, X, became a concern for police in the Indian city of Satara. Written in 2023, the short message from an account with a few hundred followers described a senior ruling-party politician as "useless".】

item.title: 美国关税最后期限临近，中国 7 月出口增长可能放缓：路透社民调
item.description: 中国的出口增长在 7 月份可能有所放缓，因为制造商正在等待中国政府能否与其最大的消费市场美国达成协议，或者唐纳德-特朗普总统是否会恢复对中国商品征收额外关税。【原文：China's export growth probably slowed in July, as manufacturers await clarity on whether Beijing can reach a deal with its top consumer market, the United States, or if President Donald Trump will reinstate additional tariffs on Chinese goods.】

item.title: 韩国称美国下调汽车关税的时间尚未确定
item.description: 韩国工业部长金正昆（Kim Jung-kwan）周三表示，首尔需要与华盛顿就韩国对美汽车出口关税从目前的25%水平下调的时间安排进行进一步讨论。【原文：South Korea's Industry Minister Kim Jung-kwan said on Wednesday that Seoul needs to hold further discussions with Washington on the timing of the promised tariff cuts on the country's car exports to the U.S. from the current level of 25%.】

item.title: 英伟达重申其芯片没有后门，敦促美国反对位置验证
item.description: Nvidia 发表了一篇博文，重申其芯片没有后门或致命开关，并呼吁美国决策者放弃这种想法，称这将是给黑客和敌对行为者的 "礼物"。【原文：Nvidia has published a blog post reiterating that its chips did not have backdoors or kill switches and appealed to U.S. policymakers to forgo such ideas saying it would be a "gift" to hackers and hostile actors.】

item.title: 亚洲股市追随华尔街走低，美元区间震荡
item.description: 周三，在疲软的美国数据凸显出关税对经济活动和盈利的损害之后，亚洲股市与华尔街同步下滑，而美元则在债券收益率下降的拖累下苦苦挣扎。【原文：Asian shares slipped along with Wall Street on Wednesday, after weak U.S. data highlighted the damage tariffs were having on economic activity and earnings, while the dollar struggled with the drag from lower bond yields.】

item.title: Seven & i 首席执行官表示，Seven & i 的北美业务首次公开募股将为快速增长提供资金支持
item.description: Seven & i Holdings 首席执行官周三表示，该公司计划将其北美业务上市，这将使这家日本便利店运营商能够举借更多债务，以实现比目前计划更积极的增长。【原文：Seven & i Holdings' planned listing of its North American operations would enable the Japanese convenience store operator to take on additional debt for more aggressive growth than currently planned, its chief executive said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 消息人士称，OpenAI 在潜在的员工持股销售中着眼于 5000 亿美元的估值
item.description: 一位熟悉此事的消息人士周二告诉路透社，聊天软件制造商 OpenAI 正在就潜在的二次股票出售进行早期谈判，允许现任和前任员工出售股票，公司估值约为 5000 亿美元。【原文：ChatGPT maker OpenAI is in early talks for a potential secondary stock sale that would allow current and former employees to sell shares, valuing the company at around $500 billion, a source familiar with the matter told Reuters on Tuesday.】

item.title: 特朗普威胁俄罗斯原油买家，油价自五周低点反弹
item.description: 由于担心美国总统唐纳德-特朗普威胁因印度购买俄罗斯原油而对其征收关税会导致供应中断，周三油价攀升，从前一天的五周低点反弹。【原文：Oil prices climbed on Wednesday, rebounding from a five-week low in the previous day, on concerns of supply disruptions after U.S. President Donald Trump's threats of tariffs on India over its Russian crude purchases.】

item.title: 投资者等待美联储理事继任，美元随之漂移
item.description: 美元周三呈区间震荡走势，在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）提名人选填补美联储理事会即将出现的空缺之前，投资者选择保持观望。【原文：The dollar was rangebound on Wednesday, with investors choosing to stay on the sidelines ahead of U.S. President Donald Trump's pick to fill a coming vacancy on the Federal Reserve's Board of Governors.】

item.title: TPG 将以超过 4.2 亿美元的价格收购澳大利亚汽车软件公司 Infomedia
item.description: 澳大利亚 Infomedia 公司周三表示，已同意被资产管理公司 TPG 旗下专注于亚洲的私募股权投资部门收购，股权价值为 6.51 亿澳元（4.2133 亿美元）。【原文：Australia's Infomedia said on Wednesday it has agreed to be acquired by the Asia-focused private equity arm of asset manager TPG for an equity value of A$651 million ($421.33 million).】

item.title: 迪斯尼旗下 ESPN 将在重大交易中收购 NFL 媒体资产
item.description: 华特-迪士尼（Walt Disney）旗下的 ESPN 周二表示，已与美国国家橄榄球联盟（National Football League）达成一项具有里程碑意义的协议，将从该联盟收购 NFL Network 和其他媒体资产，作为交换，NFL 将持有体育网络 10%的股权。【原文：Walt Disney's ESPN has reached a landmark deal with the National Football League to acquire NFL Network and other media assets from the league in exchange for the NFL taking a 10% equity stake in the sports network, the parties said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 日本 6 月实际工资连续第六个月下降
item.description: 日本政府周三公布的数据显示，由于通胀率继续超过工资增长速度，日本 6 月份实际工资连续第六个月下降，这引发了人们对世界第四大经济体以消费为主导的经济复苏的担忧。【原文：Japan's real wages fell in June for the sixth consecutive month as inflation continued to outpace pay growth, government data showed on Wednesday, raising concerns about consumption-led recovery in the world's fourth-largest economy.】

item.title: 开战三年，美欧与俄罗斯保持数十亿美元的贸易往来
item.description: 在俄罗斯总统弗拉基米尔-普京发动全面入侵乌克兰三年之后，美国和欧盟仍在进口价值数十亿欧元的俄罗斯能源和商品，从液化天然气到浓缩铀，不一而足。【原文：Three years after Russian President Vladimir Putin launched his full-scale invasion of Ukraine, the United States and European Union still import billions of euros worth of Russian energy and commodities, ranging from liquefied natural gas to enriched uranium.】

item.title: 产量增加，Suncor Energy 第二季度利润超出预期
item.description: 周二，加拿大石油生产商尚科能源公司（Suncor Energy）第二季度利润超出分析师预期，因为产量增加有助于抵消商品价格疲软的影响。【原文：Canadian oil producer Suncor Energy exceeded analysts' second-quarter profit expectations on Tuesday, as higher output helped offset the impact of weak commodity prices.】

item.title: 芯片需求强劲，苹果供应商 Skyworks 预计季度业绩乐观
item.description: 苹果供应商 Skyworks Solutions 周二预测第四季度营收和利润将高于华尔街预期，得益于经济不确定性背景下对其模拟芯片的稳定需求，该公司股价在盘后交易中上涨约 10%。【原文：Apple supplier Skyworks Solutions forecast fourth-quarter revenue and profit above Wall Street expectations on Tuesday, benefiting from steady demand for its analog chips amid economic uncertainty, sending its shares up around 10% in extended trading.】
